ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Fun in Velious
ygData.msgSnippet: I hate brownies.. When I first started playing EverQuest and decided to venture out without my sister s help, I went over to the spires in Gfay. I saw this
ygData.messageBody:
I hate brownies..
When I first started playing EverQuest and decided to venture out without my
sister's help, I went over to the spires in Gfay. I saw this cute tiny
person standing there. It said brownie scout over it's head. I was like "How
cute! Hello little guy" and walked over to greet it. It started casting a
spell but I was so new I didn't know what it was doing. Next thing I know I
see LOADING PLEASE WAIT.
That was the first time I died in the game.
One day, I will have my revenge.
luv,
-Su

At level 48 the corrupted Brownie killed me and my wife(level 49 warrior).
LFay is a tricky dangerous place.
